ARABIC: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except Iblis. He disdained to be one of the prostrators.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except Iblis. He refused to bow with the adorers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: except Iblis; he refused to join those who prostrated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except Iblis who refused to join with the others in prostration.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except Iblis (Satan); he refused to be among those who prostrated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except Iblis (Shaytan) - he refused to be among the prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But Iblis (did it not); he refused to be with those who made obeisance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: save Iblis; he refused to be among those bowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save Iblis. He refused to be among the prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But Satan did not; he refused to join those who prostrated themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But Iblis did not; he refused to be with the prostrates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: but not Iblis: he refused to be among those who prostrated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Not so Iblis: he refused to be among those who prostrated themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except Iblis (Satan), - he refused to be among the prostrators.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except iblis (father of the jinn) who refused to be one of those who prostrated themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except for Satan. He refused to be among those who prostrated themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:31] except Iblīs, the father of the jinn — he was [standing] among the angels: he refused to be among those prostrating.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Save Iblis), their chief. (He refused) he felt too proud (to be among the prostrate) to Adam (pbuh).
